TopicTitle: Hello! I've been killing kerbals for a while now.

Articles.Content: I have had the game for a while but just actually registered on the forums. Just saying hi from space in the outer reaches of the Milky Way Galaxy.
Good day, sir! Welcome to the Forums, I hope you like what you find here.

Welcome to the forums! Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game. Feel free to ask questions about anything that you might still be stuck on, or to recount your most recent or most notable exploits, or to share screenshots of a design you particularly like. Enjoy!

With a username like that, you're posting from 1955, right?

If you get that reference,

go die in a hole.

My sister just conquered my keyboard. nhjmyikyik

Hey Biff, welcome back to the (kerbal) future!
